EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder for May Webinar: ROI from Social Media
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Don't forget; there's still time to join us on May 16 at 1 p.m. ET for a webinar titled "How Solopreneurs Can Achieve ROI from Social Media <http://info.mbopartners.com/16MayWebSocialMedia_RegistrationPage.html>."
Social media expert and best-selling author Jennifer Abernethy of Socially Deliveredâ„¢ and The Sales Lounge will share her expert tips for turning the time you invest in social media into tangible benefits for your independent consultancy. Using Jennifer's techniques, your solo business will gain a competitive edge by effectively incorporating social media into your marketing strategy. Register today <http://info.mbopartners.com/16MayWebSocialMedia_RegistrationPage.html>! ___________________________________ MBO Partners
t: 703-793-6000 e: webinar@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
